column4: Anyone knows an ubuntu package for webcam security motion detector?
i've heard of a good one for any generic linux (multi screen)..
(try google: list of webcam secutity software site:wikipedia.org)
i found 'motion' as webcam security package
there was an amazing one like a year ago.. it had many screenshots on the website..
it's possible it could of been zoneminder
there's even a #zoneminder channel on freenode :)
